decision_conditions: <div style="">Prior to the commencement of works hereby approved, a scheme shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority subject to the completion of a s106 legal agreement and be put in place with associated monitoring to ensure that, with the exception of disabled persons, no resident/commercial occupier of the development shall obtain a resident/commercial parking permit within any controlled parking zone which may be in force in the area at any time, nor a season ticket/enter into a contract to park in any car park controlled by the Council.&nbsp;<br></div><div style=""><br></div><div style="">&nbsp;REASON: To ensure that the development does not generate an increased demand for on-street car parking to the detriment of the free flow of traffic, the conditions of general safety along the neighbouring highways, the amenity of the area and to accord with the Councils car parking policy and standards.</div>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-14522ee9-7fff-8339-7bb8-de54a74d2df6">The development hereby permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse is to remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-14522ee9-7fff-8339-7bb8-de54a74d2df6"><br></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-14522ee9-7fff-8339-7bb8-de54a74d2df6">REASON: To comply with the requirements of MA.2. (6)</span></p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Change of use from Class E to Class C3 residential (2 x studio flats)
